data.body: One should not be able to scroll past the map edge

data.body: I wish that the Hind or Yak could be set to attack anything or at least be able to defend themselves/return fire.

data.title: Add map "official" and "unofficial" categories
data.body: Add an option to allow only maps that are official Westwood, official OpenRA, or unofficial maps to be displayed at one time. Like the current ability to view only maps of a specific game type.

data.title: Make helicopters not fight over each other when trying to land on a helipad
data.body: Multiple helicopters attempting to land at one helipad prevents all of them landing instead of letting just one land.

data.title: [cnc]  fog of war not working consistently
data.body:
in CNC 20120630.release

if i repair a unit , the repair bay blinks  on my multiplayer opponents map, even though the repair bay is covered by fog of war. on my opponetns map
Possibly this was only the case me repairing an invisible harvester, but i think it would be the case for every unit being repaired.

data.title: Replay mode mini map
data.body: It would be great if in replay mode would be mini map to easily observe replay.

data.title: Overlay issue when using Media.PlayFMVFullscreen
data.body:
There's a weird issue with the black overlay in that it follows a diagonal pattern.

The pic says it all: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/8707714/OpenRA.Game_2012_08_19_16_48_44_962.png

Also if you're going to test this for yourself, make sure you have the movies, use my fork and run Allies 01 (or edit line 367 of ingame.yaml to read VqaPlayer@PLAYER: otherwise it will crash)

The relevant code is in OpenRA.Game/Widgets/VqaPlayerWidget.cs.

data.title: Computer Powers Off During Gameplay
data.body:
The title says most of it.  

I am running the following:
Software
Ubuntu 11.04
OpenRA 20120630
Linux Kernel 2.6.38.15-generic

Hardware
AMD Phenom 9750
4gb RAM (generic matched)
ATI Radeon HD 5500 Series

Mods
CNC vs AI ~ 6 minutes ~5x
RA vs ThePatriot ~11 minutes only 1x

Notes
Other software does not appear to have an impact, running FIrefox, Remmina, gmusicbrowser, & AisleRiot at least one of the times, running nothing other than openRA vs ThePatriot and at least 1x CNC game.

No particular action is taken by me during the gameplay, including at least once where it had been over a while (30+ seconds but I didn't count) since I had last touched anything at all just residual build commands.

I do not know which logs to check to determine what happened in the last seconds or how to start OpenRA without using the unity apps menu, so guidance on how to get better logs for you is needed if they'll be helpful.

Para

Host usually like 6 times "dropped" without loosing link. Host can chat with others but game doesn't start.

data.title: change IsAdmin indicator to d2k like
[RA] Jets and planes are unable to be repaired
data.body: Jets and planes are unable to 'dock' at the service station and are unable to be repaired.

data.title: [RA] Tanks from the War Factory
data.body:
Anything from the War Factory stays in the entrance of the factory instead of coming out, allowing other units to exit. 

This means that units get jammed and have to be moved manually.

data.title: [wish] Limit Buildlimit of Airplanes to the amount of Airfields
data.body:
there is a little Bug with the Airplanes, when i build 3 Airfields and building 6 Mig`s, the building-Queue stops at 3 (We doesnt have enougth Airfields, thats rigtht) but when i send these 3 Airplance out, the game will continue the producing of Airplanes. and blocking the the 3 airfields and also blocking the building-progress)

To fix this i have a little idea:
- in the airplane-Section we should only allow the count of builded airfields as highest building-queue for airplance
- okay i can build additional airfield in this case, but the airplanes will keep flying at the current location (over the enemy`s Base, when they cant land on airfields)

data.title: Play the "Building"-Sound only at the first Order
data.body:
Building-Sound:

I like the Buildstyle that is using in Openra, but there is a little nagging "Building"-Sound that should be play only at the first Unit... (like in tiberian Sun)

when we build only one unit, the game should response with an "Building" Sound and when we add 1 unit to the existing Building "Order"
it should only add the Request without playing the "Building" Sound again :) (like TibSun-behavor)

data.title: [Crash] After capturing the Bio-Lab i tried to produce the visceroid...

data.title: Add YAML option for 'must be filled' player slots
data.body: Add YAML option for 'must be filled' player slots so you can prevent a game from starting until all of the required slots are filled. This can help prevent crashes etc with scripted missions when there are no players, just spectators.
